alert.note: Alert for Gibson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 30 at 11:13AM EDT until April 03 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... Patoka River near Princeton. .The Patoka River will rise above flood stage this evening and crest tomorrow evening around a half foot above flood stage. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Patoka River near Princeton. * WHEN...Until early Monday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 17.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 18.6 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Monday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
